reviewText:
Loved the interesting mix of characters
Loved John Turturro
Loved the NYC locale.

Nice Find!  Glad I found it. The critics got it wrong.

This movie I saw several years ago and had it in VHS and lost it.  Ordered recently and amazed that it still is only in VHS.  This is a side splitting comedy with great actors.  Maybe someday it will be in DVD.
